content.detailedDescription:
I can't even remember the year, but it was a late autumn evening. i was 16 back then, and that night i was leaving the summer cottage. i locked the door, and as i was turning around i froze looking up: a glowing disc flew wobbling over my head and disappeared behind the houses and trees in 3 seconds. it made no noise, i only felt vibrations from it���s wobbling - it made ~10 one-two meter jumps side-to-side while flying straight. it's color was very outlandish, i guess between cyan and turquoise. 

after i lost sight of the object i rushed to the gates where my brother was waiting in the car. i asked if he saw a ufo, but he didn't. that evening i told my parents about what i saw. and then i buried this event in my memory for a few years before telling my friends and other people.

note 1: i made an illustration from a recently taken photo.
 
note 2: object wasn't flying fast, but it's rapid wobbling made it hard to see the details of the surface, but it definitely wasn't smooth.

note 3: i have had a number of ufo sightings (orbs of light) in the recent years, and i saw what looked like two stars shooting light beams at each other when i was about 5 or 6.
content.summary: Glowing flying saucer

content.detailedDescription: Woken up at night, with what i thought was my mother or father crouched near my bed picking up something, i could only see the top of a head at this point in the dark. i then said "mum, dad?", as i said this the entity seemed to have realized that i had awoken and rose up from the crouched position and ceased what it was doing with its hands (the most i could see before it rose was its forehead and shoulders moving in a motion that would suggest movement with its hands, perhaps operating something) onto two feet and stood with its torso moderately bent over the bed. it then waved its two hands over my bed whilst facing me then slowly disappeared. during the experience i wasn't paralyzed or unable to move, but i felt i strong feeling to not harm or be afraid of the situation. after it had passed i stayed awake for several more minutes and turned the tv on before going back to sleep. it was difficult to judge the entity's height and anatomical dimensions due to the angel at which it was in relation to me but approximate of 5-6 ft in height, glowing white skin(?) all over, average size head although eyes were roughly 3x larger than an average human's and were full black in colour, no visible orifice's or unusually large or small physical appendages (except for the eyes), no reproductive organs, no communication established.
content.summary: Entity in bedroom at night then vanished

content.detailedDescription: Woken up at night, with what i thought was my mother or father crouched near my bed picking up something, i could only see the top of a head at this point in the dark. i then said "mum, dad?", as i said this the entity seemed to have realized that i had awoken and rose up from the crouched position and ceased what it was doing with its hands (the most i could see before it rose was its forehead and shoulders moving in a motion that would suggest movement with its hands, perhaps operating something) onto two feet and stood with its torso moderately bent over the bed. it then waved its two hands over my bed whilst facing me then slowly disappeared. during the experience i wasn't paralyzed or unable to move, but i felt i strong feeling to not harm or be afraid of the situation. after it had passed i stayed awake for several more minutes before going back to sleep.
content.summary: Entity in bedroom at night then vanished

content.detailedDescription:
my girlfriend was the witness. she wishes to be anonymous. around 8 pm,she,and others saw several amber colored objects moving through the sky. pictures and a video were taken.
 they moved away somewhat quickly behind rooftops.Also in the area were helicopters. i also witnessed these helicopters. there were around 3-4 at this same time.
 i saw the pics and video.These weren't flares,meteors,and didn't look like conventional aircraft. didn't hear any noise.
 she called me to say something was flying near her and she didn't know what it was. i told her to calm down,get her 12mp camera and get pics and vid.She was excited,but she got the them.
  thank you for your time...
content.summary: Several sound objects,amber in color.

content.detailedDescription: I first saw this orb on the night of the 16th sept 2011. it returned tonigh, the night of the 19th! i saw it when i happened to glance out my window, and it was in a completely different spot as the night of the 16th. it was now right in view out of my windows! i watched it until it disappeared to make sure it was not a plane or star. just as the other night, it disappered starting with the outside of the circle and going in. i called my husband out and just as i got him out it came back! we looked at it through binoculars and it disappeared once again. it did not come back a third time like the last one and it also never changed to red. it stayed orange. this happened at approximately 9:30pm and lasted for about 10 minutes in total.
content.summary: Disappearing and reappearing orb returns!

content.detailedDescription: I had just gotten home from work about 8:15pm, gotten out of my car to walk across the parking lot. i was looking north when i saw an object with many lights in the sky and seem to strobe about every 20 seconds or so. to me the object had a main cylinder body and two v shaped wings with white lights running along the sides of the v's and possibly on the main body as well. it would pulsate/strobe as well. i don't recall hearing anything but traffic noise from the road nearby. the object flew over a apartment complex just north of where i live and the area is well light. it is not a usual flight path for planes to come into the airport. i actually thought it was a plane with landing lights on but after looking at it again i noticed all the lights. i could not make out any color on the object-it was a black silhouette. the object flew west/northwest over the trees and pulsated one last time before i lost sight of it. i just felt curiosity of what i was seeing at the time.
content.summary: Unusual flying object

content.detailedDescription: It was 4 in the morning when my husband saw orbs of lights hovering in a distance, his friend was a witness when this event took place. he said that the orbs would move in a fast pace to different directions. he states that the orbs would descent into the clouds, and would ascent back down. i have never seen him freaked out so bad, when he came home he woke me up and was very startled, but what he had witnessed. so we went outside to see if there was any activity going on, and that's when i witnessed a rumbling, almost thunder like sound. it was strange it sounded as if there was a huge spaceship right on top of us, but there was nothing that the human eye could see. there was a recent sighting a month ago, i guess were not alone! oh, and he states that some of the orbs had a wing like feature to them...Could they be angels? well to my opinion, at that hour i would think that the angels are fighting the demons...Oh well? we will soon find out.
content.summary: Low flying white bright orbs...

content.detailedDescription:
I went out on the deck at about 2 am for a cigarette, and just mentally  registered "green" and thought somebody must be doing fireworks. but i hadn't heard anything, which seemed a little strange because normally we can hear the pop sound when they are set off.  we live by a lake and people are always doing fireworks at all sorts of strange times, so i didn't actually look at it until i got my cigarette and sat down.  then i realized it wasn't fireworks, but a neon green upside down arial font u, about aspirin sized from my vantage point.  while i was watching, it moved fairly slowly in an approximately 30 degree arc from south to north (maybe se to nw), and then instantly was gone.  it didn't pulsate, didn't glow, didn't have a tail, didn't fade out, it was just a neon green upside down u that moved across the sky and then instantly wasn't there.  i actually watched it for about 30 seconds, but it was there when i first came out, and i have no idea how long it was there before that.

as i was watching i wasn't frightened, i was thinking this is very, very weird, and is the kind of thing people call the police about.  and i wondered what i could possibly tell them if i did call - i saw a neon green upside down u that disappeared?  i didn't call.  i did look in the newspaper for any reports, but there were none.  the next day i went out and took a photo so i can mark exactly where i saw it.  i finally decided i had to report it to somebody, just to get it on record.

the photo was taken the next day and the two green us show where i first began watching, on the left, and where it disappeared, on the right.
content.summary: Bright neon green upside down u shaped thing in the sky, remained a steady green without pulsating.  no glow, no tail, moved in an arc and then vanished instantly.  did not fade out.

content.detailedDescription: While i was out walking my dog tonight,and i say this because i like looking at the stars at night.I noticed a very large very black out line just barely above the trees.While i was trying to figure out what it was this unbelievable bright light lit up,it looked like the sun in the middle of the day,but just above the trees and at 11:00 at night.It made no noise of any kind and just sat there.While looking at this thing i got the feeling that i could not control like i was a fish in a fish bowl with my owner looking in at me and shinning a flash light.The light blinked back out,but i could see that the out line of the thing was still just sitting there.I got kind of scared and went in the house and locked the doors.After i finally got into bed i couldn't sleep,for some reason i looked out my bedroom window and there was this face pressed up against it,but it was not human it was kind of large and defiently a grey color with huge very black eyes.I wanted to believe that it wasn't real so i looked away and when i looked back it was gone.This is not a hoax and i am not crazy,and i don't want to look that way by calling any body.I just don't know what to do if there are little creatures hanging around out side my house. please let me know if there are any more reports of strange things going on in fremont,ohio
content.summary: I saw a face looking into my bedroom window it was greyish with big eyes

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend were driving home from miami are to the west coast of florida. it was about 9:15 on 9/18/11. we were on alligator alley headed west, after about 15 mins of being on the alley we see a white light flashing way ahed of us. as were driving you can tell theres more than one light. we get about 30 feet away probably and it was about 70 feet above us. it was a perfect square. there were multiple lights areound the edges. the lights pulsated and thats how i was able to see the corners on the object. it was easy to tell that it was a square. it was grey in color. bright white lights. it was so close to the ground it seemed like. there was absolutley no sound at all. we have no idea what else it could have been. it was moving very slowly in the median above our heads. very big. shocked at what we saw.
content.summary: Alligator alley florida sighting

content.detailedDescription: One of my sons was leaving for his home and i walked him out after he had driven away i stayed on the front deck for a few minutes and was smoking a cigarette  we live in the adirondak mountains  by the canadian border were off the grid  and have to make our electricity my view of the sky is incredible theres no buildings or lights of anykind were on top of a mountain by ourselves  so almost daily  were out looking at the skys its beautifull  up here so  iwas smoking my cigarette  looking at the sky its been a bit cooler up here latley so the sky was very crisp and clear tonight  and you could see alot  of stars  well  straight out in front of me about 30 degrees up  i noticed a star that seem to be flikering imediatly  dismissed as plane cause also noticed red in the strobe  finished my smoke  and stayed out there  thinking about hunting season  and how i need to cut wood  noticed again the strobe  and noticed it hadn't really moved which a plane could not do so i started to stare at it and noticed  there were more colors  there was red  green  blue yellow  and white watched it for about five more minutes  it stayed motionless  so i went inside and told  my other kids to come outside and check this thing out  my sons who witnessed it with me are 27 and 23 my sister and brother who also witnessed it are 27 and 18 they all came out and saw the same thing  then i thought to  get a rifle scope to see it through  wow  it was much clearer   you could see  each light seperately the were flashing in a weird pattern  some would stay on while others blinked  then the others would stay on while the other ones blinked  tnen theyd all blink  while they blinked  you could see it was a large square  or triangle shape  i thought to try to get somekind of photo  but honestly  were  not rich people and i dont go in much for the technology stuff  i tried the camera on my cell phone  but we have old crapy  prepay type phones  and nothing showed up but black sky  we do have a cheap older digital cam   but the batteries were dead  so we continued to stay and watch  as it started to jump around a bit it would go  left  right  up down  circles  spirels we watched it  for about an hour  then came inside about 45 minutes later my son checked  and it was gone  we were all left feeling amazed and excited   so  i  figured  we'd  share it with you  thanx
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Myself  and four other family members saw lights in the sky it was really cool

content.detailedDescription:
It was a clear night, and i had a feeling that i would be able to see all the stars and maybe something more. i watched outside from the front of the house in the street. i saw a bright white light moving quickly across the sky,with absolution there was no sound, so i went inside to grab my camera. when i came back out, i didn't see anything out of the ordinary again, but i stayed outside for approx 20 minutes to make sure. i came into the house to warm up a bit and decided to go outside on the back porch to check out the stars and the sky again, just to be sure. i was out back approx 3 minutes when i looked over my head, like i always do when looking for stars in the night sky, and saw a slower moving ufo, whisper quiet or no sound at all, in the shape of a 'v', with the nose of it being the converging point of both sides, or an upside down 'v', with multiple bright white lights scattered all over the bottom of the craft, flying southwest. i yelled for my husband and continued watching the ufo move in a southwest direction for about 40 or 50 seconds. and then, it just seamed to converge into one main round light before it just ''took off at the speed of light''. the craft or ufo didn't appear to have the standard defined hull to it. it was just gone after that, and no matter how long i stood outside, it just didn't re-appear. it was strange that after the event i saw a larger number of airplanes and helicopters in the air that i have ever seen in our area, especially at approx 10:00, 10:30ish p.M., as well as for a while afterwards. this was the most amazing specimen of a ufo that i have seen to date! and i have seen at least 5 ufo's in the last 20 years. this one was different than the others, in shape, size, color & light color. it almost reminded me of a stealth bomber, but from where i was it had passed just to the left of the big dipper and it was at least the size or larger than the constellation of the big dipper! i wish i had just turned on the video portion of my camera to capture it, but i was in such astonishment and didn't want to take my eyes off of it, because this is a once in a lifetime experience, for some, and i didn't want to miss a thing! i had an experience this past summer where it was extremely quiet, clear and perfect summer night. no rain for almost a week before, and no rain for almost a week after, and very low humidity with consistent temperatures. at around 3a.M. on a weekday, i was in the restroom with the lights off and windows wide open, when all of a sudden an extremely bright white flash of light came from nowhere! i sat in awe for a few moments almost unable to move. i looked out the windows and didn't see a thing, or hear anything for that matter. to this day i am still trying to figure it all out, but now i believe it was a ufo.  i know one thing is for sure, i will be watching the sky more often, and with my camera in tow!
i am wondering if anyone else saw this, especially in my area!? don't be afraid to say so, this can be done anonymously. thank you all for listening and reading my story! good luck to you all!
content.summary: I saw v shaped ufo flying overhead and watched as it just ''took off'' & disappeared in seconds!

content.detailedDescription: I was in kindergarten in 1961 i was playing on the jungle jim when the bell rang to go back to class..I was running through the tan bark when in a instant i felt someone was looking down at me...I stopped in my tracks and looked strait up and saw a round silvery whitish object blended into the blue of the sky..About the size of a half moon..It was round and had a darker round feature in the center..I was standing there hypmotized on this object ..And the teacher had to scream at me to come to class..Later that afternoon when i walked home before i went inside the house i lookd up to see if it was still there...It was in the same position ..It hadn't moved a inch..It wasn't the moon.. the  moon is never  at 12 oclock high in santa clara ...And it wasn't a blimp from moffett field..Seen many of those when i was younger in the 1950's
content.summary: Ufo spotted in sky 1961

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 8:30pm on september 16, 2011 a couple of miles outside of amite, la as i looked toward the southwest sky a bright light caught my eye about 50 degrees above the horizon to the southeast. i quickly glanced over to find it getting brighter until the light faded slightly and proceeded to move about 10 degrees to the southeast before dissapearing,i then observed another faint object moving from the other way that materialized from the same area the initial object dissapeared. this second object was followed by another object that took roughly the same path as the first object. the duration of the event took about 30 seconds in all. my girlfriend witnessed the event as well and claims she saw the first object avoid something but i cannot confirn since i didn't see it. i am an amateur astronomer with 14 years experience and an avaiation enthusiast so i am well versed in sky phenomena and general operations of aircraft especially in my area. immediately following the event i checked the tracks of many satellites including the international space station which was the only explanation i could possibly think of but none were in the area. in my opinion the objects were moving to slow to be a satellite, i have often observed them in my countless night outside with my telescope. ive always been on the fence about wether i believe or not but im convinced now, ive been looking at the sky nightly for 14 years and ive never seen anything like this. at first it frightened me a bit because it appeared as if it was only gonna get bigger but that later turned to excitement when i reallized what i had just seen.
content.summary: Light in the southeast sky materialized and moved to southeast followed by 2 other objescts.

content.detailedDescription:
photos were taken in mesa facing west on 6/29 at 9:55 pm.
2nd photo is 16 seconds after the first.  the odd thing is i didn���t know the object was present when taking the photos.  only after viewing at home did i notice this long white thing.  i can supply exif data for photos.
content.summary: No event.  objects only viewed in photos.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 8:34 pm (2034) on september 18, 2011 i came out of my home to take my 3 small dogs out at my front yard. while sitting atop my vehicles tail gate i observed a starlike object crossing at high velocity the sky from south  to north on a straight trayectory at a 60 degree angle while facing west. it crossed the sky faster than an airliner airplane that at the same time was flying at aproximately same altitude but at a slower rate of speed. photos were taken using a i-phone but photos are not clear.
content.summary: Starlike object flew from south to north at a 60 degree angle over homestead, fl.

content.detailedDescription: Wife judy and i were putting items from garage sale back in garage from drivway.  wife saw it first and said look east in sky.  there was this reddish object flying right over our driveway.  it was soundless and pulsated some or blinked slightly.  it covered distznce from treeline to treeline in approx 5 to 10 seconds; would guess about 6 0r 7. it did not have any navigational or blinking lights.  looked like a hot air bzloon elongated.  we live on east side of city in georgetown area and feel others must have seen it also as it was about 8;45 pm on a clear but dark saturday night.  any other fort wayne reports collborating this sighting??  thank you.  ps tried to also contact "ufocasebook.Com"  which i check every so often but was unable to get their "contact us" link to cooperate.
content.summary: Red/pink orb with tail flew from east to west right over wife and self

content.detailedDescription: Wife came home from shopping and noticed 4 bright red/orange lights in sky in close formation. pulled into driveway and watched for awhile. called me to come outside. when i got there, there were 2 ufos. one was v shaped with 4 red/orange lights, other object was single red/orange light. the v shaped one's 4 lights then shifted and moved and became 1 red light. before it did this it was stationary and hovered. rather large, quite spectacular really. they eventually flew off beyond sight. i did grab a flashlight and beamed one but nothing became of it.
content.summary: Sighting in milwaukee 9/17/2011

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on the golf cart when i saw lights flashing that went all through the sky. this event happened in the city of destin in florida. after standing outside and looking at it flash for about 20 minutes, it just stopped. at first, i thought it was the powerline by the hospital, but we asked a worker the next morning and she said that no light had been turned on that night.
content.summary: Flashing lights

content.detailedDescription: I was taking photos of clouds, when i viewed them i noticed a strange object in the 2nd of a series of three.  these were taken one after the other, seconds apart.  this is how i know it is not a cloud formation or conventional craft.  there was not enough time between photos for it to have been either. the first photo was taken at 3:02 pm the 2nd at 3:03 pm and the 3rd at 3:03 pm.
content.summary: Did not see ufo when i took 3 photos consecutively

content.detailedDescription: Yesterday evening, i was riding my bike near the blm land in north eastern placitas, facing south, admiring the beautifully colored pink clouds surrounding the east and south sandia mountains when an unusual light abruptly came on just west of the mtn range.  unusual insofar it had a bluish tint to it and was brighter than a star. i kept my eyes on it as i rode home hoping whatever it was stayed around for me to look at it with my binoculars.  well, through the large 20x80 binoculars i have, the light appeared to be a weather balloon made of the most beautiful white gossimer material i've ever seen, with what appeared to be a rope dropping down from the balloon equal to a third the size of the balloon; no balloon "basket" was visible. however, when i got my 14mg pixel camera with 5x zoom out, only an orb appeared in the visual. i figured when enlarged, the photo would show the tear-drop shape of the balloon, but it doesn't (see attachment).  as described by the las cruces viewer, i too watched it turn pink then red and when it got dark, i could no longer see it.  so was it an orb disquised as a ballon, or merely a weather balloon?  perhaps someone else from the area has a photo taken closer than mine. for the record i estimate it was about 5 miles south of me and just a few miles north of the sandia casino resort and should have been visible to a large number of people driving on i-25 corridor between santa fe and albuquerque.  i apologize for not including the mountains in my photo, as i was focusing solely on the "balloon."
content.summary: Re submission 31875 las cruces nm - saw it from placitas nm photo attached

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: It sends chills throughout my entire body to even think about it now. the strangest thing is this is not a one time incident. every night i go onto my balcony to smoke. i usually smoke anywhere from 3 to 5 cigarettes throughout the night while looking up at the stars. i have a pretty good starmap in my head so at any given time i am looking at big dipper and other star formations. it started a couple of weeks ago i started seeing this star-like light flickering in the night sky. it just appears like someone flicked on a lamp. i have tried cameras and binoculars to try and see the object in more detail but they lack the magnification to see better. the best sightings of it are with my own eyes. when i saw it the first time i immediately went thru my checklist. not a plane. not a helicopter. not a airport tower or a high rise building. what could it be then? so i start thinking even harder at the things ive heard such as high intensity flares weather balloon chinese lanterns and non of them make sense. if someone was to tell me it was one of these things i would be extremely offended sad even that someone would try and insult my intelligence in that way. i have seen it off and on since the first time and i have even got some of my friends to make sure im not a lunatic and tell me they see it as well. we speculate as to what it could possibly be but have still not been able to figure it out. it is sometimes brighter and more random flashing of beautiful colors the bluest of blues and the most purplest purples i or my buddy has ever seen. not knowing what it is is really bothersome. i know this sounds weird but i had a sort of intimate moment with the object the other night. i sat by myself it was around 2am i was smoking my last cigarette of the night and staring at the star-like object as i have done for about a week or so previous when i sort of felt like it knew {even from as far away as this thing was} that i was watching it. i felt an overwhelming urge to stare at it i felt like a moth. i could not look away. more like i didnt want to look at anything else in the world ever i only wanted to look at this flickering. i went thru two emotions at that point scared goosebumps followed by immediate relief as if i saw an old relative friend or pet. i actually had tears swell in my eyes but not bad or sad but really happy? like i always knew the possibility of life but at that moment i knew in my heart and soul what i was seeing and feeling was real. no one can tell me otherwise. when you know something and you can feel it.. an epiphany is the best way to describe it like i suddenly realized that i was staring into something different then anything else. i also saw it moving in very small almost nothing zig zags and there was at one point something smaller that came out of it an sped around a bit. looked similar to a bat flying around at night barely any light barely visible but very agile and without a doubt there... i have to say most people would be scared of being labeled or being told they are lying but i am not. i know what i saw and continue to see. the last time i saw it was last night after 10pm before 2am.
content.summary: A bright random multi colored pulsing starlike big dot mid sky

content.detailedDescription: I walked my dog out to the front yard and immediately my eye caught a bright red glowing object high up in the southwest portion of the sky.  i immediately knew this was something unusual so i took him back inside and grabbed my phone.  it was bigger than any planet or star and pulsated as it slowing travelled across the sky from west to east.  my perception was that it was very high and probably miles away.  we have those really tall palm trees in our neighborhood and it was travelling above them.  it then stopped and in my perception hovered for a few minutes and slowly became smaller and smaller until it disappeared.  this led me to believe that it was heading south.  possibly it was not hovering at all, but changed directions and appeared to be hovering. i tried to take a video with my cell phone but when i looked at it all i could see where normal colored stars.  a plane did closely pass by it and i remember thinking to myself, "don't they see that?"  there were no other witnesses to the event.
content.summary: Red star-like object south of chandler

content.detailedDescription:
On sunday 31st july i saw something in the night sky that was quite simply ... stunning !

i was stood on a balcony in a small rural village near the east coast of bulgaria in the 'yambol' region. it was 12:30 at night and i was on my own after my friend had just left me about 20 minutes before.
i love sitting on the balcony and watching the sky, its perfectly clear with not many street lights and no big cities or towns near by to pollute the sky with lighting or smog.

i turned around to get something from the house and as i turned back round to continue my enjoyment of the night sky i saw two red vertical lights, about twice as big as a typical plane in the sky at night, slightly diamond in shape, next to each other and they were flashing in sequence, one after the other.
they were in the distance, and could have been on the coast above the city of burgas, as the city is only a two hour drive away to the east, but far enough away as to not see its glow or lights.
between yambol and burgas its mostly small villages and forest.

one light would flash then the other would flash quite quickly, the lights also had a tinge of blue in them when they flashed, the flashing wasnt like a plane light ( slow and continuous ) it had a kind of fluttery sparkle to it.
the lights ( for a moment ) were stationary.
i became absolutely transfixed on the lights knowing full well that this wasnt turning out to be something i typically saw in the sky, a total feeling of awe and excitement came over me.
the lights were stationary for only a few seconds and then, the two lights began to seperate sideways.
one would flash then move left then the other would flash and move right, when they began to move they were no longer red, elongated and diamond in shape, they were small and yellow white in colour.
they became further and further apart and gradually fading out of sight after the light on the left had practically crossed the whole of the sky and faded to nothing.

the whole sighting lasted about 2 to 5 minutes, i had my camera within reach, but to be honest i knew that if i had tried to photograph the lights after they had seperated there wouldnt have been much to see on camera and i would have missed much of my sighting while messing with the camera and the settings. so .. the best thing i thought of at the time was to call my girlfriend during the sighting, who was back home in england, and tell her what i was seeing 'live' on the phone.

i spend much time watching the sky, i see planes, satelites, strange glows of the moon through the clouds, chinese lanterns and everything else, and i can always explain something i see in the sky, however this was definitely something different.
it was something technological and unlike anything i have ever seen.
content.summary: 2 red lights stationary close together diamond or rectangle shape flashing together in fluttery ways  then seperating into small white lights and  moving across the sky in opposite directions miles apart until fading into nothing

one light would flash then the other would flash quite quickly, the lights also had a tinge of blue in them when they flashed, the flashing wasnt like a plane light ( slow and continuous ) it had a kind of fluttery sparkle to it.
the lights ( for a moment ) were stationary.

the lights were stationary for only a few seconds and then, the two lights began to seperate sideways.
one would flash then move left then the other would flash and move right, when they began to move they were no longer red, elongated and diamond in shape, they were small and yellow white in colour.
they became further and further apart and gradually fading out of sight after the light on the left had practically crossed the whole of the sky and faded to nothing.

the whole sighting lasted about 2 to 5 minutes, i had my camera within reach, but to be honest i knew that if i had tried to photograph the lights after they had seperated there wouldnt have been much to see on camera and i would have missed much of my sighting while messing with the camera and the settings. so .. the best thing i thought of at the time was to call my girlfriend during the sighting, who was back home in england, and tell her what i was seeing 'live' on the phone.

i spend much time watching the sky, i see planes, satelites, strange glows of the moon through the clouds, chinese lanterns and everything else, and i can always explain something i see in the sky, however this was definitely something different.
it was something technological and unlike anything i have ever seen.
content.summary: 2 red lights stationary close together diamond or rectangle shape flashing together in fluttery ways  then seperating into small white lights and  moving across the sky in opposite directions miles apart until fading into nothing

content.detailedDescription:
Last night about 8:35 p.M. i went on the back of the boat we live on and noticed an extremely bright,red object in the sky moving from east to west over the gulf.  i called my paul out to see it, as well.  we have a lot of air traffic over us (middle of the florida keys) and i know it was not an airplane...It had no blinking lights and appeared to be large and extremely bright.  paul suggested that if you put a glowing cigarette up in the sky at arm's length it was almost that big.  

we both watched it as it flowed slowly though the sky from east to west, a couple of minutes perhaps.  it slightly veered off of a straight line...Like a plane would...But then just disappeared.  according to the compass in my iphone it was at about 38 degrees ne, about 20ish degrees above the horizon.  there were no clouds to speak of in the area, save directly north out on the gulf closer to the everglades.  living on a boat as we do we check the radar often.  

just before this thing disappeared it appeared to "fade" just a bit in the front and then "poof" was gone!  we sat on the back of the boat for quite some time after that scouring the sky to see if it came back out from anywhere and not a thing.  thinking perhaps there was a cloud it might have gone behind we watched for that, too.  no clouds there. 

i have seen many unusual things in the sky but this one was glowing red which is different from any others.  it wasn't "white-hot" white.  this sounds funny but i was almost drawn to watching it and to look up at that time which may be why i called my paul to see it too.  

we will be on the back of the boat tonight just in case they are still hanging around cruising our waters.  we are a "mature" couple and not given to being aroused or frightened easily.  this one has me stumped. 

as opposed to being just a random entry in your data base, if you have any light that you can shed on this i will certainly appreciate any feedback you might offer.  i will keep you informed of any further findings.  thank you for the work you do.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Brilliantly red glowing object moving slowly in sky then disappears

content.detailedDescription: Myself and a friend were on her balcony on the 12th floor, having a cigarette. she noticed the object first. it was hovering over the city. it appeared much higher than the rest of the buildings and skyscrapers. it was large and looked like it was far away. it pulsated many colors quickly. i tried to take photos of the object but it did not show up. i think this is because it was pulsating so quickly. it was round and not well defined. the edges were blurry. it was hard to keep track of the colors because of the fast pulsating. i believe it was blue, yellow and red. it was hovering in the same spot for over an hour. we went back and forth from inside to the balcony several times throughout the hour to look at it.
content.summary: Circular shaped, hovering and pulsating lights on the ufo

content.detailedDescription:
Saturday september 17, 2011 4:31am: 

i went outside, was on 2nd floor balcony, which faces due south, smoking a cigarette before i went to sleep, wasn't looking into sky, was looking straight ahead into next apartment building breezeway.  a small non-flashing, red light (like a led light or power indicator light) came into my field of vision, i wasn���t looking up at the sky or anything.  it captured my interest because i thought it was flying extremely low, must be a helicopter? don���t see many helicopters in this neighborhood unless it���s the law chasing somebody & if that were the case, there would have been searchlights. plane?  where���s the flashing?  also don���t they have white lights as well?  also, there was no sound whatsoever.  the sky was clear, however it had rained for the 1st time in over four months most of the day before.  the air was humid & thick. what i saw was hauling *** (word removed cms 09/18/11 14:32 cst flg), faster than anything i've seen. it remained at the same elevation, heading from my right to left diagonal path. as it grew closer, i noticed some sort of circular type field around the red light in center. the circle was translucent & it was glistening/shimmering opalecant colors.  not twinkling like christmas lights, not blink pattern at all.  there were also i think 6 rays surrounding the opal circle, shining from the circular field, all the same length, just about the length of the circle in size. i simply couldn't take my eyes off it, i then remembered i had my android mobile in my hand, so i hit the buttons to quickly try to capture it on digital. it took me 5 seconds to get it started, by then; the object was straight above me. i tried to get it in my viewfinder, but it was moving so quickly, i just couldn't keep up. i attempted 3 shots 8 seconds apart, i've no flash & the lens was on the full zoom out level. it then was out of my view once it flew over the building. i ran down the stairs trying to adjust the zoom in, got to ground level & my view was blocked by the building. i should have run to the street, but i didn't think of it, i was so amazed! i felt no fear of the object. i gave up & went upstairs & indoors. then i looked to see what i might have gotten on digital, but with no luck, just darkness. i went to sleep. i woke up @ 10am & the 1st thing went thru my mind was the event.  i plan to upload the photos onto my computer & see if i can find anything by resizing them.

(locaton moved to fi box) cms 09/18/11 14:35 cst flg (this is the info from the camera)
content.summary: 1 red lite very low, flying hi speed saw a glistening translucent aura w/rays

content.detailedDescription: There was about 80 people at a birthday party(approx 40 adults). location was carpentersville. the lights came to our attention because someone in the crowd said that it was weird how many airplanes were above. at that moment alot of people looked up and people commented that it was not airplanes. they were reddish/ orange orbs with even spacing between them. they were moving at a speed faster than an airplane. the lights did not blink or flicker. people also notice that there were also search lights  pointing in the opposite direction of these orbs.  they emmitted no noise.  video will be posted shortly. several people joked that they were ufo's while some mentioned that they were those small candle "hot air ballons." they were moving e to w. video posted can be see at the 20 sec. mark.
content.summary: 20-30 orange/reddish orbs moving in straight line at high speed

content.detailedDescription: As assistant state director for arizona mufon, i received a call from a witness in tucson (170 miles away) at 6:20 in the morning.  i then looked outside with binoculars and saw the orb he was talking about.  it was stationery and had a red lit-up area on the interior, lower left side.  i immediately thought "high altitude balloon" but it was perfectly round, no tear-drop shape like all i've seen before.  it started "dropping" small lighted pieces of itself, then larger worm-like, undulating pieces which floated and very slowly descended, all the time twisting and tumbling.  i watched 3 of these things fall from it, then they disappeared.  after watching the large orb for 30 minutes through binoculars, and after i had come inside the house for 5 minutes, when i went back outside it was much smaller and was moving to the north and slowly descending.  after 5 more minutes of watching, it disappeared completely from sight.
content.summary: Large, extremely bright, perfectly round shining orb in southeast sky
